  Chaos Domain is a game about shooting bad people in the face.

  Apart from that, it is also a run and gun platformer, powered by Unreal 
  Engine. The game is highly influenced by games from 8-bit and 16-bit era, 
  including Contra/Probotector series, as well as titles like Abuse and 
  Doom Troopers.
